# MySqlConnectionStringBuilder.AllowZeroDateTime property

Returns `DATETIME` fields as [`MySqlDateTime`](../../MySqlDateTimeType/) objects instead of DateTime objects.

```csharp
public bool AllowZeroDateTime { get; set; }
```
